verses.verse: Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> while <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> by <S%H8034>name;<s%> and on you he shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> who <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on you, and <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> on you.'"

Then he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H4159>sign<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H4159>sign<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H7167>split<s%> <S%H7167>apart<s%> and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on it shall be <S%H8210>poured<s%> out.'"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8610>"Seize<s%> him." But his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out <S%H5921>against<s%> him <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7725>draw<s%> it <S%H7725>back<s%> to himself.

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> also was <S%H7167>split<s%> <S%H7167>apart<s%> and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> were <S%H8210>poured<s%> out from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> according to the <S%H4159>sign<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H9134>entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> for me, that my <S%H3027>hand<s%> may be <S%H7725>restored<s%> to me." So the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9134>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the king's <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H7725>restored<s%> to him, and it <S%H1961>became<s%> as it was <S%H7223>before.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H935>"Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with me and <S%H5582>refresh<s%> yourself, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H4991>reward.<s%>"

But the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you were to <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2677>half<s%> your <S%H1004>house<s%> I would not <S%H935>go<s%> with you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> would I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> or <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

"For <S%H3651>so<s%> it was <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1980>came.<s%>'"
So he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and did not <S%H7725>return<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

Now an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> was <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>deeds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> these also they <S%H5608>related<s%> to their father.

And their father <S%H1>said<s%> to them, <S%H1696>"Which<s%> <S%H335><s%> <S%H2088>way<s%> did he <S%H1870>go<s%>?" Now his <S%H1980>sons<s%> had <S%H1121>seen<s%> the <S%H7200>way<s%> <S%H1870>which<s%> the <S%H834>man<s%> of <S%H376>God<s%> <S%H430>who<s%> <S%H834>came<s%> from <S%H935>Judah<s%> had <S%H3063>gone.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H2280>"Saddle<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for me." So they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for him and he <S%H7392>rode<s%> away on it.

So he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> an <S%H424>oak;<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Are you the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am."
Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1980>"Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with me and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> with you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> with you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> will I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> or <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> with you in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

"For a <S%H1697>command<s%> <S%H1980>[came<s%>] to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> do not <S%H7725>return<s%> by <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you came.'"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I <S%H1571>also<s%> am a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> you, and an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>'Bring<s%> him <S%H7725>back<s%> with you to your <S%H1004>house,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>'" [But] he <S%H3584>lied<s%> to him.
So he <S%H7725>went<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> with him, and <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, as they were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> at the <S%H7979>table,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H7725>back;<s%>

and he <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> you have <S%H4784>disobeyed<s%> the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and have not <S%H8104>observed<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you,

but have <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>said<s%> to you, <S%H398>"Eat<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>"; your <S%H5038>body<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave<s%> of your fathers.' "

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H8354>drunk,<s%> that he <S%H2280>saddled<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for him, for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back.<s%>

Now when he had <S%H1980>gone,<s%> a <S%H9030>lion<s%> <S%H4672>met<s%> him on the <S%H1870>way<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> him, and his <S%H5038>body<s%> was <S%H7993>thrown<s%> on the <S%H1870>road,<s%> with the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> it; the <S%H9030>lion<s%> also was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5038>body.<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H7993>thrown<s%> on the <S%H1870>road,<s%> and the <S%H9030>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5038>body;<s%> so they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> [it] in the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3427>lived.<s%>

Now when the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it,] he <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4784>disobeyed<s%> the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> him to the <S%H9030>lion,<s%> which has <S%H7665>torn<s%> him and <S%H4191>killed<s%> him, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him."
Then he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2280>"Saddle<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for me." And they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> [it.]

And he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> his <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H7993>thrown<s%> on the <S%H1870>road<s%> with the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> and the <S%H9030>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5038>body;<s%> the <S%H9030>lion<s%> had not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7665>torn<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey.<s%>

So the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H5038>body<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H5117>laid<s%> it on the <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> it <S%H7725>back<s%> and he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> and to <S%H6912>bury<s%> him.
And he <S%H5117>laid<s%> his <S%H5038>body<s%> in his own <S%H6913>grave,<s%> and they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him, [saying,] <S%H1945>"Alas,<s%> my <S%H251>brother!<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> him, that he <S%H559>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When I <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in the <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6912>buried;<s%> <S%H5117>lay<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

"For the <S%H1697>thing<s%> shall <S%H1961>surely<s%> <S%H1961>come<s%> to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7121>cried<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>"

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>event<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> did not <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> but <S%H7725>again<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> from among <S%H7098>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> any who <S%H2655>would,<s%> he <S%H4390>ordained,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to be <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>event<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H9128>sin<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> even to <S%H3582>blot<s%> [it] out and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> [it] from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
